code: export var GET_CUSTOMER_DETAIL='GET_CUSTOMER_DETAIL';export var GET_CUSTOMER_DETAIL_SUCCESS='GET_CUSTOMER_DETAIL_SUCCESS';export var GET_CUSTOMER_DETAIL_FAIL='GET_CUSTOMER_DETAIL_FAIL';export var GET_CUSTOMER_DETAIL_RESET='GET_CUSTOMER_DETAIL_RESET';export var getCustomerDetail=function getCustomerDetail(params){return{type:GET_CUSTOMER_DETAIL,params:params};};export var getCustomerDetailSuccess=function getCustomerDetailSuccess(response){return{type:GET_CUSTOMER_DETAIL_SUCCESS,response:response};};export var getCustomerDetailFail=function getCustomerDetailFail(response){return{type:GET_CUSTOMER_DETAIL_FAIL,response:response};};export var getCustomerDetailReset=function getCustomerDetailReset(){return{type:GET_CUSTOMER_DETAIL_RESET};};
